scripts.bootstrap: npm run bootstrap:mongo && (npm run bootstrap:client & npm run bootstrap:server)
scripts.build: npm run build:client & npm run build:server
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm run build:prod && cp -R ./client/dist/ ./dist/client
scripts.build:server: cd server && npm run build:prod && cp -R ./server/dist/ ./dist/server
scripts.start: npm run start:mongo && (npm run start:client & npm run start:server)
scripts.clean: npm run clean:docker && npm run clean:client && npm run clean:server
scripts.clean:docker: docker kill $(docker ps -a -q); docker rm $(docker ps -a -q)
scripts.lint: npm run lint:client && npm run lint:server
scripts.test: npm run test:client && npm run test:server
scripts.ncu: cd client && npm run ncu && cd ../server && npm run ncu
scripts.ncu:update: cd client && npm run ncu:update && cd ../server && npm run ncu:update -u
